job_tasks.phrase: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the design and implementation of AI-driven systems, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, particularly in the context of generative AI and automation.

job_tasks.phrase: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: Configuring network functions (AAA, PCRF, SMSC, MMSC) and ensuring seamless service delivery involves software and system configuration, aligning with 'Software Development' tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business objectives and desired outcomes of the role, indicating an understanding of business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: optimize and automate complex support tasks.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase points to the application of technology to solve business problems (support tasks) and improve processes, which is a core aspect of understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting
job_tasks.justification: Scripting and system configuration are direct indicators of software development and implementation tasks.
While broad, 'improving processes through technology' in the context of AI and automation implies modifying or enhancing existing systems, which can involve model adaptation or development.

job_tasks.phrase: elevate our customer support to new heights.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase signifies a focus on improving a business function (customer support) and achieving higher performance, aligning with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: analyze data to derive actionable insights
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing data to derive insights is a component of data engineering, involving data processing and interpretation.

soft_skills.phrase: proactively reshaping the entire support process
empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact
crucial part of our dynamic team

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes designing and implementing AI-driven systems, configuring network functions using AI tools, and improving processes through AI. While not explicitly mentioning LLMs or specific GenAI frameworks, the focus on AI systems for automation and operational enhancement strongly aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile, which includes building and maintaining production-grade systems.
